### Strategic Science Plans
AFSC Strategic Science Plans define vision, mission, core values, goals and objectives for a 5 year period.    
[FY2023-FY2027](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1m3KldIXozp1mSH-VwzSFw0F35kuVaojx/view)

### Annual Guidance Memos
Annual Guidance Memorandums prioritize activities for a single year to meet the objectives in the Strategic Science Plan.    
[FY2024](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1aMWiMJYuM8pueNbeHaLJoRBG6VlzTFYP/view)    
[FY2023](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1EuLPPk031l8KWI1bVu-W0F3H9waHoRK4/view)
